pr_title: Cache span names derived from class and method names

timeline.message: cache class and method based span names
cache class and method based span names
cache class and method based span names
use enclosing class name for anonymous classes
use enclosing class name for anonymous classes

timeline.bodyText: I'm wondering if this really is desirable, since the method names will be attributed to the enclosing class instead of where they are actually defined, which could lead to confusion.
timeline.author: bantonsson
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -198,7 +198,8 @@ class BaseDecoratorTest extends DDSpecification {
     target                         | name
     SomeInnerClass                 | "SomeInnerClass"
     SomeNestedClass                | "SomeNestedClass"
-    SampleJavaClass.anonymousClass | "SampleJavaClass\$1"
+    SampleJavaClass                | "SampleJavaClass"
+    SampleJavaClass.anonymousClass | "SampleJavaClass"

replies.bodyText: Indeed, but it also reduces resource name cardinality, so may be worth considering.
replies.author: richardstartin

timeline.message: use enclosing class name for anonymous classes
use enclosing class name for anonymous classes
use enclosing class name for anonymous classes
make Rediscala instrumentation resource name consistent with other instrumentations
cache class and method based span names
make Rediscala instrumentation resource name consistent with other instrumentations
make Rediscala instrumentation resource name consistent with other instrumentations

timeline.author: tylerbenson
